title: Overwrite AppV1 with V53 “NEXUS OLYMPUS” cinematic intro + viral sharing + WhatsApp booking

requirements.text: Delete all existing content of `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` and replace the entire file with the exact V53 “NEXUS OLYMPUS” code block provided by the user (full overwrite), preserving components, local seed data (`SWISS_DB`, `SHOWREEL`, `INITIAL_SALONS`, `PROFESSIONS`, `RICH_PRESETS`), Tailwind classes, imports, UI strings, and interaction logic as given.

quotes: INSTRUCTION : Efface tout le contenu actuel de `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` et remplace-le par le code ci-dessous.

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` matches the user-provided V53 code content as the application UI implementation (intro -> landing -> client -> pro studio).
The app continues to mount via the existing `frontend/src/App.tsx` wrapper that renders `AppV1`.

requirements.text: Ensure the project compiles and runs after the V53 overwrite by applying only minimal mechanical adjustments required by this repository (e.g., missing/incorrect imports, unresolved identifiers, invalid JSX, duplicate default exports), without changing the intended V53 UI layout, styling, copy, or interaction behavior, including the five pillars: Olympus Intro showreel, native share via `navigator.share`, WhatsApp `wa.me` deep-link booking, Swiss smart location suggestions, and dark cinematic UI with trust badges.
acceptanceCriteria: Build succeeds with no TypeScript/JSX compile errors after the overwrite.
On launch, the Olympus Intro showreel is displayed full-screen and only entering proceeds to the app.
Tapping a Share action uses `navigator.share` when available; when unavailable, the fallback path executes without crashing.

Confirming a booking generates a working WhatsApp `wa.me` link with a prefilled message that includes salon name, selected services, selected date/time, location context (including address for domicile), and total price.
The location input shows suggestions by ZIP prefix or city substring using the in-file `SWISS_DB` dataset.

constraints: Do not modify any frontend immutable entry files (including `frontend/src/main.tsx` and the hooks in `frontend/src/hooks/*` listed as immutable by the platform).
Keep `frontend/src/App.tsx` as the thin wrapper that renders `AppV1` (no changes to app entry wiring).
Do not add backend calls; keep the V53 implementation as local-only state/data as provided.
Any changes beyond the V53 paste must be strictly limited to build-breaking mechanical fixes and must not alter intended UI/UX, styling, copy, or interaction behavior.
nonGoals: Implementing or re-enabling Internet Identity authentication, role-based routing, or React Query data loading.
Connecting the V53 UI to the Motoko backend for salons/bookings/images.
Changing V53 user-facing UI copy/language (the pasted V53 UI strings must remain as provided).
Adding new features or refactoring the provided V53 code for optimization or architecture changes.
